name: Galaxy Adventure (rAjke)
description:
Just an indie, easy platformer game I made. I am new to game development so if you experience any bugs, or issues, feel free to let me know. Also, the game is not very long, but I hope you enjoy anyways! Galaxy Adventure is a game which was created in GDevelop. The sprites, background and the whole game was made entirely by me. This was my first attempt at game development, so bugs could become an issue while playing.

Nevertheless, I hope you have a great experience playing it! Cheers
